member.name: IDxcCompiler.Compile
member.summary: Compile a single entry point to the target shader model. IDxcCompiler.Compile is deprecated; use instead.
member.param: An optional file name for pSource. Used in errors and include handlers.
An array of pointers to arguments.
An optional user-provided interface to handle #include directives.
The compiler output status, buffer, and errors.

member.name: IDxcCompiler.Disassemble
member.summary: Disassemble a program. IDxcCompiler.Disassemble is deprecated; use instead.

member.name: IDxcCompiler.Preprocess
member.summary: Preprocess source text. IDxcCompiler.Preprocess is deprecated; use with the -P argument instead.
member.param: An optional file name for pSource. Used in errors and include handlers.
An array of pointers to arguments.
An optional user-provided interface to handle #include directives.
The preprocessor output status, buffer, and errors.
